name: Janko (the boat game)
description:
A game where you sail around in a little ship, explore the map, buy and sell cargo, and avoid dying.

I'm mostly putting the game up here so I have an easier way to share the project and gather feedback. Needless to say, it's in development, and is far from a finished product. Most of the assets have been gathered from image searches and youtube to mp3 converters lol. I'll find a way to create all my own assets if I get serious about this game, but right now, my priority is to make sure everything works.

Feedback is appreciated, good or bad.
